channel.title: CVE Feed for argoproj -- argo-events
channel.description: The latest CVEs for argoproj -- argo-events

item.title: CVE-2022-31054|2024-08-03T07:03:40.254Z -- argoproj -- argo-events
item.description: Argo Events is an event-driven workflow automation framework for Kubernetes. Prior to version 1.7.1, several `HandleRoute` endpoints make use of the deprecated `ioutil.ReadAll()`. `ioutil.ReadAll()` reads all the data into memory. As such, an attacker who sends a large request to the Argo Events server will be able to crash it and cause denial of service. A patch for this vulnerability has been released in Argo Events version 1.7.1.
